title: Emerald Radiance: Delicate Bridal Kante Haaram
features: This exquisite Kante Haaram features a meticulously crafted floral pendant adorned with a central, pear-shaped Emerald. The necklace band showcases a unique open-work design embellished with round emeralds. Diamond clusters accentuate the emeralds along the band and add brilliance to the pendant, with delicately dangling gold beads enhancing its graceful movement. The pendant employs a traditional setting style with modern design integration.
occasions: and elegant evening gatherings. Suitable for both traditional and modern attire.
description: This handcrafted Haaram is a testament to the exquisite artistry of Hyderabad's finest jewelers. The combination of vibrant emeralds and sparkling diamonds creates a captivating contrast. Its short length makes it perfect for showcasing a beautiful neckline. The timeless design ensures this heirloom piece will be treasured for generations, making it a valuable investment and a meaningful symbol of love and prosperity.
